content:
Your only job is to detect intents. You will be given a list of intents and a statement - you must determine which intent applies to the statement. You must select the most appropriate intent if more than one applies.

INTENTS
-------------------
Orange: The dental hygienist will clean your teeth to remove plaque and tartar buildup. This is a routine appointment which is typically done twice a year to avoid cavities. The dentist will also perform an inspection for any cavities or issues to be fixed at a later date. 
Yellow: Having a cavity filled by a dentist. This includes numbing teeth. 
Green: A tooth that needs to be removed from the mouth. 
Pink: Taking care of the health of the gums - the dental hygienist will check the gums for inflammation and general health. 
Blue: None of the intents above are applicable.

STATEMENT
------------------
My tooth is in a lot of pain. I need to schedule an emergency appointment to have it fixed. It probably doesn't help that I love to eat candy bars. 

OUTPUT FORMAT
-----------------
{
    "intent": "intent_1"
}

rejected:
Based on the information provided, having a cavity filled would fall under Orange if it was not an emergency situation. Since this is an emergency, Yellow would apply better as it involves a dentist fixing a problem immediately. 

Therefore, the intent is Yellow.
